sentences.english: Butterfly class at rest their wings folded up in back is.
sentences.chinese: 蝶类在休息时它们的翅是合拢起来立于背上。

sentences.english: A discussion about the butterfly resources, and A Suggestion about how to protect them are given.
sentences.chinese: 对蝶类资源进行了初步的论述，提出了一些保护对策。

sentences.english: Person of butterfly for "dancing in the flower".
sentences.chinese: 人称蝶类为“飞舞的花朵”。

sentences.english: These butterfly species are mainly distributed in evergreen broadleaf forests.
sentences.chinese: 蝶类主要分布在常绿阔叶林。

sentences.english: And for butterfly kind of close relatives of the moth but less known.
sentences.chinese: 而对于蝶类的近亲蛾类却知之较少。

definition: Lepidoptera (insect order including butterflies 蝶類|蝶类 and moths 蛾類|蛾类)
Hymenoptera (insect order including ants and bees)
Odonata, order consisting of about 6,000 species of dragonflies and damselflies
Hemiptera (suborder of order Homoptera, insects including cicadas and aphids)
reptiles/also written 爬行動物|爬行动物
Orthoptera (insect order including grasshoppers, crickets and locusts)
